name: markdown-to-asciidoc

0.8.0.name: markdown-to-asciidoc
0.8.0.description: An Atom plugin for converting a markdown file to asciidoc. Wraps the markdown-to-asciidoc plugin for the IntelliJ Java IDE. Uses node-java as the node.js bridge to the Java converter class.

0.7.0.name: markdown-to-asciidoc
0.7.0.description: A wrapper of the IntelliJ markdown-to-asciidoc plugin. Uses node-java for node.js as the bridge.

0.6.0.name: markdown-to-asciidoc
0.6.0.description: A wrapper of the IntelliJ markdown-to-asciidoc plugin. Uses node-java for node.js as the bridge.

0.5.0.name: markdown-to-asciidoc
0.5.0.description: A wrapper of the IntelliJ markdown-to-asciidoc plugin. Uses the node-java module for node.js as the bridge. Depening on your environment, the first conversion after starting Atom can be costly (~20s) due to the jvm initializing.

readme:
# markdown-to-asciidoc package

An Atom plugin for converting a markdown file to asciidoc. Wraps the markdown-to-asciidoc plugin[1] for the IntelliJ Java IDE. Uses node-java[2] as the bridge to the Java converter class.

[1]https://github.com/bodiam/markdown-to-asciidoc

[2]https://github.com/joeferner/node-java
